snippet: A trove of documents compiled by the father of Derek Boogaard offer a rare prescription-by-prescription history of the care given to a prominent, physically ailing athlete who struggled with addiction.
abstract: Trove of documents compiled by the father of hockey player Derek Boogaard offer a rare prescription-by-prescription history of the care given to a prominent, physically ailing athlete who struggled with addiction to some of the very drugs the team doctors were providing; scores of prescriptions came before and after Boogaard’s entry into the league’s substance-abuse program in September 2009 for an addiction to painkillers and sleeping pills; he died of an accidental overdose in 2011.
lead_paragraph: A trove of documents compiled by the father of Derek Boogaard offer a rare prescription-by-prescription history of the care given to a prominent, physically ailing athlete who struggled with addiction.

headline.seo: In Hockey Enforcer’s Descent, Easy Access to Prescriptions
headline.main: In Hockey Enforcer’s Descent, a Flood of Prescription Drugs
headline.print_headline: In Hockey Enforcer’s Descent, A Flood of Prescription Drugs
